Html:
Why is there such a huge difference between Molten and mage armor with the Reckless Pyrestone ?
With motlen aura on that gem gets 11.87 rated but with Mage armor 1.73 rated .
Depends on a ton of different things. Most likely, switching to Mage armor lets you use a different rotation, which doesn't benefit from haste (GCD or cooldown capped already).
